title: Fifteen years from now Ravi’s age will be four times his present age. What is Ravi’s present age? - Quora

response.answer_text: Very very simple !!!Let the present age of Ravi= X, then X+15= 4X.So 3X= 15 and X= 5.Therefore the present age of Ravi= 5- years. ===========================By common sense we see that after 15- years the age becomes 4- times. That is in 15- years the age increases by 3- times.So 3- times age= 15.Present age= 15÷3= 5 =============================
LET the age of the ravi be x so x+15=4x its 4x of present age now 4x=x+15 4x-x=15 3x=15 x=15/3 x =5 so the age of ravi will be 5 years
